column1: ね or ねっこ、根 or 根っ子 - root

ぎゅうにゅう、牛乳 - milk
しょうゆ、醤油 - soy sauce
さみしい、寂しい、淋しい - sad
いる – to exist [for animate objects]
ある – to exist [for inanimate objects]

column2: to raise or extend one's hands
備わる - to be furnished with
埋もれる - to be buried

なぜなら – that is because

column1: そうだ – indicates that it seems the verb occurs [e.g.
たい – indicates desire to perform verb
だろう – indicates that it seems the verb occurs; also used to ask whether the verb occurs

column1: て – te form of verb or adjective [see explanation]
ならびに – as well as
な – the copula particle used after quasi-adjectives
っけ – particle indicating that the speaker is trying to recall some information ["What class is next -kke?"]
